Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: (someone's) bone and flesh; hence: = member of the same family or group
a person connected by blood or marriage
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse, including those associated to him or her

Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

= causative action by which humans pour out a liquid, ≈ exclusively used for libations

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= exclamation expressing a strong conclusion, rejecting the event to which it refers to as inappropriate behavior
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= state in which someone is willing to do something
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp iron (בַּרְזֶל) head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= state in which humans or animal are fatally wounded with a sharp object

= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= state in which a countable entity is two in number

Node.definition: = state in which humans and deities are regarded as worthy of honor and respect
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
particle linking an event to an object; = relation indicating that event X results in a certain level of status for object Y
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= man, also known as Benaiahu (בְּנָיָהוּ) ◄ son of Jehoiada (יְהֹויָדָע) ► warrior and army commander under kings David (דָּוִד) and Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= state of being associated with a certain attribute, attitude, or behavior, ◄ referred to as a child of that attribute, attitude, or behavior

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= process by which an event happens with great strength or intensity
= town, also known as Jekabzeel (יְקַּבְצְאֵל) ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which a countable entity is two in number

= soldier known for his extreme bravery, strength, and/or ability to fight; ◄ compared to a lion|= man; ◄ from Moab (מֹואָב) ► father of two men that were killed by Benaiah (בְּנָיָהוּ) son of Jehoiada (יְהֹויָדָע)
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression and strength

= hole in the ground, big enough to hold a person and deep enough that a person cannot climb out; ◄ usually dug out of the ground or hewn from rock; ► often used to collect and store rain water; ≈ fresh water from a spring is considered superior to stagnant water from a cistern

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= frozen crystallized water vapor in the form of very white flakes which fall as precipitation from the sky and cover the ground during freezing cold weather; as soon as the temperature rises above freezing, it melts and becomes water; ≈ associated with cold, whiteness, or purity
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= descendant or inhabitant of Mizraim (מִצְרַיִם) (Egypt)
literally: a person of measure; hence: = an unusually tall or large person
= state in which a countable entity is five in number

= linear measure, corresponding to the length of the forearm, from the tip of the middle finger to the point of the elbow; the exact measure is uncertain; apparently there were two standards: the normal, estimated as 44.5 cm; and the royal, estimated as 51.81 cm

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= descendant or inhabitant of Mizraim (מִצְרַיִם) (Egypt)
= a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp iron (בַּרְזֶל) head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer

= wooden bar, approximately 5 6 centimeters in diameter; ◄ part of weaving equiment; ► used for attaching the warp threads to and to roll up the finished cloth as it grows in length; ≈ associated with thickness and heaviness
= person whose occupation is weaving fabric
